full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Battery Cycler RFP

### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** WS4322753892 - Doc4322790980
* **Publication Date:** November 23, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 28, 2023, at 14:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** January 5, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

### Project Overview

Canada is seeking offers from qualified vendors to provide a battery cycler or potentiostat with EIS capabilities to Natural Resources Canada's Canmet Materials laboratory in Hamilton.

### Requirements

* The contract is to be awarded on the basis of the combination of Technical Merit and Price.
* All technical specifications and requirements are available in the solicitation documentation.

### Important Information

* All bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery and Canada Buys by 14:00 EST on December 28, 2023.
* Any bids received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

### Contact Information

For any questions or clarifications regarding this solicitation, please contact Darlene Keenan, SPAC/PSPC, at darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to companies that are participants in the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Regions of Opportunity

None specified.

### Currency

All prices and services must be quoted in Canadian dollars.

### Evaluation Criteria

The proposal will be evaluated based on the combination of Technical Merit and Price.

### Attachments

None.

### Notice URL

The full solicitation can be accessed through the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18094637?extsite=MTgwOTQ2MzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Amendment

Amendments to this solicitation will be posted through Ariba Discovery.

Note: The crucial details from the original entry have been maintained, and the entry has been rewritten with proper grammar, punctuation, and professional formatting to make it easy for potential contractors and buyers to understand. The length has been kept under 400 words as per your request.                                                                                         </br> []
